content:
I'd be happy to help you set reminders for your weekend activities.

Since I'm a text-based AI, I can't directly set reminders on your device or calendar. However, I can guide you on how to set reminders on your preferred calendar or reminder app.

Here are a few options:

**Option 1: Google Calendar**

* Open Google Calendar on your device
* Click on the "+" icon to create a new event
* Enter the activity title, such as "Lunch with Parents" or "Dinner with Friends"
* Set the start time and duration for the activity
* Select the day of the week (Saturday or Sunday) and the frequency (e.g., every week, every other week, etc.)
* Set a reminder for 30 minutes before the event (or at a time that works for you)
* Click "Save" to create the event

**Option 2: Apple Reminders (for iOS devices)**

* Open the Reminders app on your iPhone or iPad
* Tap the "+" icon to create a new reminder
* Enter the activity title, such as "Lunch with Parents" or "Dinner with Friends"
* Set the reminder for the desired time and day (Saturday or Sunday)
* Tap "Repeat" and select the frequency (e.g., every week, every other week, etc.)
* Set a reminder time, such as 30 minutes before the event
* Tap "Add" to create the reminder

**Option 3: Any other calendar or reminder app**

* Follow similar steps to create a new event or reminder in your preferred app
* Set the title, start time, duration, and frequency (e.g., every week, every other week, etc.)
* Set a reminder time that works for you

Some tips to keep in mind:

* Be specific with your activity titles, so you can easily identify them in your calendar or reminder list.
* Set reminders at a time that works for you, so you have enough time to get ready and prepare for the activity.
* Consider setting reminders for the day before or a few hours before the activity to help you plan and prepare.
* You can also set reminders for recurring activities, such as weekly or bi-weekly events, to help you stay on track.

Remember to adjust the reminder time and frequency according to your needs, so you can stay organized and enjoy your weekend activities with your loved ones!
